definition: cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane

sentences.english: Those sitting in the back began rushing to the front of the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 坐在后排的乘客开始往客舱的前面冲。

sentences.english: They were in the saloon of a sinking ship, looking up at him through the darkening water.
sentences.chinese: 她们困在沉船客舱里，透过发暗的水体凝望他。

sentences.english: This is Air China cabin crew chief, director of the voice of Kai-Yan.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国国际航空公司客舱部主任乘务长阎开的心声。

sentences.english: The D8's unusual shape gives it a roomier coach cabin than the 737.
sentences.chinese: D8非同寻常的外形使其具有比737更宽阔的客舱。

sentences.english: The pressurization system provides the pressure differential between the cabin and ambient.
sentences.chinese: 增压系统提供客舱与外界环境之间的压力差。

sentences.english: Because the air is so cold and thin, the cabin has to be air-conditioned.
sentences.chinese: 由于空气又冷又稀薄客舱必须进行空气调节。

sentences.english: The crew had to do the routine safety demonstration and in-cabin service, all in twenty to twenty five minutes, for some seventy passengers.
sentences.chinese: 机组人员照例做了安全示范，之后在客舱提供服务。

sentences.english: While staying in the passenger cabin, he would miss his family very much.
sentences.chinese: 待在客舱的时候，他会非常想念他的家人。

sentences.english: The Economy Class cabin, features lightweight and slim design seats with four-way headrest.
sentences.chinese: 经济客舱，设有四向头枕轻巧纤薄的设计席位。

sentences.english: Hard-sleeper class cabins don't have doors, I know.
sentences.chinese: 硬卧客舱没有门，我知道。

sentences.english: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, masks will descend from the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 在客舱突然失压的情况下，面罩会从天花板上脱落。

sentences.english: We pressed the buzzer in our cabin and a steward arrived instantly.
sentences.chinese: 我们按了客舱的呼叫器，一个乘务员马上来了。

sentences.english: Passengers would sit in a wide cabin, rather like a small amphitheatre.
sentences.chinese: 客舱宽敞大方，而不再类似小型阶梯教室。

sentences.english: Also be able to install the cabin doors and observation windows for monitoring the operation.
sentences.chinese: 还能够安装客舱门和观察窗用于监视操作。

definition: attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
